definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: The shares are little changed this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年特易購股價變化不大。

sentences.english: So, next time you're cashing in your reward points at Tesco, spare a thought for Curtis.
sentences.chinese: 所以下次在特易購兌現你的獎勵積分時，想想柯蒂斯。
